A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing to say the best. This movie kept trying to get somewhere that it just never got to. The last Star Wars movie was pretty good. Rogue One was awesome. This one disappointed. SPOILER: We didn’t wait that long to see Luke Skywalker and have him leave us like that. Wow. The sidebar story with the casino was also a head scratcher. Hopefully JJ Abrahams saves the 3d movie.
